Dodds Garage Door Systems gives new meaning to the word "reliability".
"We show up when we say we will, we do the job with the expertise of over 52 years in the business, and we tidy up. We never leave a mess!"
"When you require garage door service or garage door electric opener attention, please call us. You won't be sorry. We guarantee it!"
Having done that, just sit down and relax, you have just hired Greater Toronto's #1 garage door company, Dodds Garage Door Systems is your RELIABLE garage door firm.

profile:
Few people realize the importance of a working garage door until it breaks down - garage doors are protection for you and your belongings. They house your car, your storage, and serve as an additional entrance to your home. For many they may feel like an afterthought, but they provide a great deal of security in a way that few other doors do.
Best Choice Garage Doors

At Best Choice Garage Doors, our goal is to help you with all of your garage door needs. We are available in Toronto and GTA and specialize in any and all garage door related services including:

    Installation – When you need a new and state of the art garage door installed, we can provide you with the perfect choice for the design of your home – one that will withstand the elements and provide you with the look and security you need.
    Repair – When your garage door breaks down for any reason, our service experts are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. We will send our professionals directly to your home to get your garage door fixed so you can feel safe and secure again.

We also offer both residential and commercial services, and are available for all of your garage door projects both large and small. Our customer service is second to none, and we will be happy to supply you with the installation, repair, or replacement that you need. Call us today to learn more about what we have to offer.

profile:
Fix It Right Garage Doors has been in the industry for years, meaning that when it comes to experience within the GTA, we are your best bet. Our company is one of the most reputable, trusted names in garage door repairs and installations. We offer a variety of products, installing, replacing parts and repairing locally. Our technicians are capable of a number of repair and installation services such as: Residential and commercial garage door installations, garage repair and maintenance, fixing snapped or broken cables and installation of new motors. 

We operate on the basis of full transparency, meaning we will never mislead our customers in any way. Our only goal is to ensure your 100% satisfaction with our repair or installation services, which is why we offer a lifetime warranty on all services and offer complete diagnostics before undertaking any repairs or installations. We help you determine the correct course of action for your budget, home’s exterior, garage door and needs. In order to fully support you, we offer only the best brands in the industry such as LiftMaster, Richards-Wilcox, Clopay, Genie, Steel-Craft, C.H.I, Pentagon and Haas doors. Our spare parts are from genuine manufacturers, and we stock parts for almost all makes and models of garage door. In this way, we can guarantee your satisfaction with our services.

Call us now and experience the difference our superior technical skills, expansive selection and committment to transparency can offer you. Contact us for a service call!

Fix It Right Garage Door Repair, Installation & Replacement in Toronto, Etobicoke, Scarborough, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Thornhill, Aurora, Newmarket, Brampton, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Nobleton, Caledon, Milton, Innisfil, Bradford, Barrie, Pickering, Stouffville, Ajax, Oshawa & more.

profile: Future Buildings is a large manufacturer and distributor of prefabricated steel buildings. The company was founded in 1981. Its headquarters is based in Markham, Ontario, Canada. Future Buildings offers the following types steel buildings: Garage, Workshop, Storage, Agricultural, and Commercial. An estimate is provided on a free of charge basis. The company also offers a free brochure. All buildings come in kit form with manuals. They are made from Galvalume Plus Steel. Future Buildings provides a 30 year rust perforation warranty. Customer assistance is provided by phone and by e-mail.

profile:
All Overhead Doors

We have been in business since 2006, with professional staff having over 20 years of experience in the Overhead Door Industry.  We service the entire GTA and beyond including Georgetown, King City, Nobleton, Milton, Oshawa, Barrie, etc.  

We are a small company that prides itself in its service.  We specialize in Custom Residential Garage Doors in Wood or Steel Maintenance Free Insulated Doors and carry only Liftmaster/Chamberlain electric operators and all accessories.   

We have an excellent and friendly service staff to look after all your repair needs, including springs, cables, tracks, balancing lubrication, and anything related to having your garage door function properly. 

We are an official provider of many Manufacturers so there no product or style we can not provide.

We offer a 24/HR Service and FREE On Site Estimates so please contact at any time.

PLEASE VISIT OUR INSTAGRAM PAGE TO VIEW SOME OF OUR MOST RECENT PROJECTS @alloverheaddoors

Geo Garage Doors is a reliable and highly-trained family-owned business operating throughout the Greater Toronto Area. Each day, residential homeowners across Ontario choose Geo Garage Doors to service their needs. Whether you need maintenance or installation, we are here to help.

Our mission is to improve the safety, security, and convenience of residences in the communities we serve. We fulfill this goal by installing, maintaining and servicing all types of garage doors. We specialize in door repair, replacement, installation, openers and more.

profile:
Quality Garage Doors is the leading supplier and servicer of overhead doors in the GTA. We are a qualified and reliable company that has been repairing, replacing, and installing regular garage doors and springs, as well as speciality carriage doors, for many years now. To this day, we continue to offer the highest quality garage doors at the lowest prices. We service all of the GTA but specialize in Aurora, Bradford, King City, Markham, Newmarket, Pickering, Richmond Hill, Stouffville, Thornhill, Woodbridge, and Vaughan.

As a qualified garage door contractor, we specialize in the installation and maintenance of garage doors, garage door springs, carriage doors, and overhead doors. We are the most experienced garage door contactor available in Toronto and its surrounding area.

Don’t sacrifice quality for price, at Quality Garage Doors we strive to keep our garage prices competitive and affordable for you and your family. Our customers are our number one priority, so it is very important to us that we provide you with a perfect solution for your overhead and carriage doors no matter what your budget.

You can always trust in a reliable garage door contractor such as Quality Garage Doors, to put a stop to problems before they turn into larger issues and cost you money. Our expertise ensures that we will have everything from your remote opener to your garage door springs working smoothly for long after they are installed.

So call Quality Garage Doors today to take advantage of our low garage door prices, our exceptional service, and our years of experience as the GTA’s best garage door contractor.

profile:
TOP RATED NEWMARKET GARAGE DOOR REPAIR AND REPLACEMENT SERVICES

Due to its history, Newmarket is one of the top places in Ontario to live. bordered by Aurora to the south and East Gwillimbury to the north, it has beautiful features of a town to raise a family in. with the rise in the community, houses and condos being built up, it is no wonder that a professional Garage door and door company like ourselves are essential to the building of the community. Newmarket Garage Doors and Doors has been with the community of Newmarket since the beginning. All our professional garage door repair and replacement technicians are local to the community and are fully trained in the installation of all garage doors and doors. a garage door or even a door in general is the least appreciative thing in a house until you realize just how much you need it to function properly. when the time comes around that it stops functioning properly you will need a professional garage door repair and replacement technician to install it for you. Needing to replace a garage door can take a lot out of your bank account, that's why our team of garage door repair and replacement technicians understand your situation and will assist you in supplying the most affordable rates possible to our customers. At Newmarket Garage Doors and Doors we strive to provide the best quality work to our customers while still providing affordable prices. That is why you should give us a call any time of day or night to help you out. 

EMERGENCY GARAGE DOOR REPAIR SERVICES AROUND THE CLOCK 

An emergency can happen when we least expect it with no warning at times. Unlike most repair garage doors and doors companies Garage Doors and Doors in Newmarket is here for our community 24 hours a day 7 days a week to better serve our customers. Our garage door repair and replacement technicians will arrive to your door step equipped with their mobile service units filled to the rim with all the tools and materials needed to complete any job your garage door or doors would need. Our garage door repair and replacement technicians are licensed, bonded and insured to repair or replace any garage door or residential door given to them to fix. Don't feel frustrated about having to wait for business hours to call on a professional for an emergency repair. Call on the professionals at Newmarket Garage Doors and Doors to help to get your problematic doors repaired or replaced as soon as it happens. we're available 24 hours a day 7 days a week even on holidays. just give our friendly customers service team a call today.  Here are just some of the common jobs our garage door repair and replacement technicians can perform: 

•	Garage Door Opener Replacement 
•	Brand New Garage Door Replacements
•	Garage Door Panel Replacement
•	Garage Door Track and Roller Repair
•	Fresh Garage Door Installations
•	Garage Door Opener Replacement
•	Garage Door Cable Replacement
•	Garage Door Sensor Replacement
•	Emergency Garage Door Repair
      And Much More!

 24 HOUR NEWMARKET GARAGE DOOR REPAIR SERVICES
There is not many garage door repair and replacement companies in the Newmarket area open after regular business hours. No matter is you have an emergency with your garage door or any door, Newmarket Garage Doors and Doors are available to the community 24 hours a day 7 days a week to help assist with any repair or replacement work needed for your garage door or your residential/commercial doors. All of our garage door and door repair and replacement technicians travel with their company provided vehicles that are equipped with all the tools and materials needed to repair or replace any door. We are one of the very few companies in the area that provide Newmarket with 24 hours a day 7 days a week service even on holidays at no restrictions or extra cost associated to our customers. We have been acknowledged as one of the most reliable garage door repair and replacement service in Newmarket based on the opinion of our loyal customers over the last few seasons and that is due to our response time and the preparedness by our technicians. Newmarket Garage Doors and Doors provide intense training and ensures our garage door repair and replacement technicians are all bonded, insured and maintained a clean background check at all times of their employment. All the garage door and door repair and replacement technicians will arrive on site with their mobile units and any hour to assist our community of Newmarket when they are in need of a garage door or door repair or replacement. To learn more just give us a call and let us prove how reliable and ready to assist the community we are.
